mapper.select: select id, creator, remark, port, target from nps.tunnel where client_id = #{id} and (id like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or creator like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or remark like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or port like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or target like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%'));
mapper.insert: insert into nps.tunnel(id, client_id, creator, remark, port, target) VALUES (#{id}, #{client_id}, #{creator}, #{remark}, #{port}, #{target});
